Reviews.Title: Beautiful phone
Reviews.Author: Aviva
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! I love this phone. Touch is very fast, good camera, excellent system... I am very glad with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: about my purchase and thanks for everything
Reviews.Author: Juan Aranguren
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent device, which is why we'll buy another.. It was my first time that i bought something by amazon, the experience was great and feel safe buying here... thanks

Reviews.Title: Good Phone Good price.
Reviews.Author: Jack Tepper
Reviews.Content: It's a full feature Android 4.1 phone, build and call quality are very good, compared to other more expensive brand phones it lacks nothing.Its the second Huawei y300 i buy, having lost the first one by accident.Bought it from Global Mobiles and their service was excelent.

Reviews.Title: Nice device
Reviews.Author: Oscar Mojica
Reviews.Content: the phone works perfectly, the touch screen responds immediately, the only small issue I have with the phone is with the memory cards I tried different brands and for some reason sometimes it doesn't recognize the cards, you just need to restart the phone to resolve this issue,

Reviews.Title: Startphone
Reviews.Author: Iceman
Reviews.Content: I played with this phone over the week end. Like everything there are pros and cons. It is well priced, decently featured, and appears to be well built. The software is quite limited in that you can only download apps from their app center, and that to me seems to be this phones biggest short fall. I am by no means an expert on smartphones, but the software does seem a little more cumbersome to operate then other phones that friends of mine have. These are my initial impressions, but like I said, I've only had it a short time, and like with anything, as I get more and more familiar with it I'll adapt to make it more user friendly for me. I think for the price it is a viable option for a lot of people looking for an entry level phone.
